common_1115_rival_01:
Oh my gosh, look at all these huge, gorgeous
crystals! They go all the way to the bottom![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1115_botan_01:
One slip and we can kiss our short lives
good-bye...[VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1115_rival_02: Oh, good call! Watch your step![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1115_friend_01a:
So the professor’s down there somewhere...
waiting for us.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1115_friend_01b:
So the professor’s down there somewhere...
waiting for us.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1115_friend_03:
All right, team! Watch yourselves and let’s get
to the bottom of this thing![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1115_rival_npc:
This place looks unreal. Maybe there really is
treasure down here like the stories say![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1115_friend_npc:
Yeah... This place’s like something from a whole
other world.\c
Makes you feel like maybe you already died and
went somewhere...[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1115_botan_npc:
Is it just me, or do the crystals here give off the
same glow as when Pokémon Terastallize?\r
There’s gotta be some sort of connection...[VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1115_friend_04:
Only one way to find out.\c
Come on, everybody. Let’s keep moving...
We’ve got to go all the way down.[VAR 0114(0006)]
